title: Vase, 1933
markings: On underside: painted in blue: Keith Murray (facsimilie signature) above a line and WEDGWOOD MADE IN ENGLAND; stamped WEDGWOOD, MADE IN ENGLAND, D,E,W
provenance: Purchased from a London dealer (possibly Alfie's Antique Market) by donor, 1980s. Given to Cooper-Hewitt, 2012.
description: Tapering cylindrical form with circular mouth, broad shoulder; body decorated with horizontal grooves; creamy yellow matt glaze.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, 1933.
1933. Glazed earthenware. Gift of Max Pine. 2012-17-2.
